title: HG Stain Remover Extra Strong 500ml, Fast Acting Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner Spray, Deep Cleaning Solution for Wine, Coffee, Grease, Mud, and More Red - 1 Pack
features: Powerful stain removal: Formulated with active oxygen to tackle tough stains, including wine, coffee, mud, grease, and pen marks on carpets, upholstery, and soft furnishings.
Fast acting deep clean: Works in minutes without the need for pre-treatment; simply spray, wait, and wipe for refreshed fabrics.
Safe on most fabrics: Suitable for carpets, cushions, curtains, and more; always perform a patch test on delicate textiles before full use.
Convenient and easy to use: No dilution required; ready-to-use 500ml spray bottle ensures fast, simple application with professional results.
Trusted HG professional quality: Part of HG's renowned cleaning range, delivering deep-cleaning power trusted by households across Europe.
description: Restore freshness and beauty to your home with the HG Stain Remover Extra Strong, your powerful solution for the toughest fabric and carpet stains. Crafted with active oxygen technology, this deep-cleaning formula lifts even the most stubborn marks — from red wine and coffee to grease, chocolate, mud, and more — restoring the softness, colour, and cleanliness you remember. Feel the satisfaction as your favourite sofa, curtains, cushions, or car upholstery regain their original brilliance. No need for expensive professional treatments — just spray, wait a few minutes, and wipe clean for instant results. The ready-to-use 500ml spray is gentle on most fabrics yet strong enough to fight the most deeply ingrained dirt. How to use: Shake well, spray directly onto the stain, let the formula work for a few minutes, then wipe with a clean, absorbent cloth. Always test on an inconspicuous area before full application. Not suitable for oriental rugs or delicate fabrics sensitive to wet cleaning. Safety: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes and skin. Wear protective gloves. Store upright in a cool, dry place. Bring back the clean comfort of your home and enjoy the pride of spotless furnishings — all with one easy spray. Choose HG Stain Remover Extra Strong and take control over life’s little accidents. See the difference. Feel the freshness. Love your home again.
